thread.title: Justin Bieber's 'ex' Sahara Ray in racy Instagram snap
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber's 'ex' Sahara Ray in racy Instagram snap | Daily Mail Online

author: Andrew Court For Daily Mail Australia
title: Justin Bieber's 'ex' Sahara Ray in racy Instagram snap
text:
She was recently seen in snowy Aspen, Colorado.
But stunning Sahara Ray appeared to be back in more tropical climes on Thursday, sharing a picture that showed her posing in a skimpy bikini.
The 23-year-old Australian hit headlines last August, after stripping down for a skinny dip with 'ex' Justin Bieber , but kept her swimwear on for her latest snap.
Not just a pretty face: Australian star Sahara Ray stripped down to show off her fantastic physique in a skimpy bikini that was one of her own designs on Thursday
In her new photo, bikini-designer Sahara flaunts her flawless figure in the skimpy swimwear, that is one of her own designs.
The coal-coloured top barely covers the beauty's ample assets, as she almost busts out of the bikini.
The nude coloured bottoms stood out against the star's bronzed skin, as she gave a seductive pout to the camera.
Back in paradise: Sahara posed a second sultry snap that appeared to show her back in Bali after a trip to Aspen, Colorado
The star completed her look with a grey towel wrapped around her head, looking as if she was drying off from a shower or a swim.
It was the first of two racy images the model uploaded on Thursday.
Hours later, Sahara, who is the daughter of famous surfer Tony Ray, posed by a pool as she carried a bowl of frangipani flowers.
Feeling nippy? On Wednesday, Sahara shared a snap from the ski fields of Aspen, that quickly become one of her most popular posts
Tilting her head back, with her eyes closed, the designer looked at home in the exotic surrounds.
A day earlier, the star was a world away in chilly Aspen, where temperatures have been hovering around tops of 2 degrees celsius.
Despite the nippy temperatures, Sahara didn't feel the need to cover up, going braless in a see-through lace top, that revealed her pierced nipples.
Infamous skinny dip: Sahara hit headlines after she was caught on camera enjoying a swim with Justin Bieber on a Hawaiian holiday last August
Posing in the snow, the stunner gave the camera her signature seductive look as she played with her unbrushed locks.
The racy pictured proved to be one of Sahara's most popular posts, gaining over 57,000 likes
The model was linked to pop superstar Justin when they were caught on camera shedding their clothes at a Hawaiian lagoon mid-last year.
It is unclear if they were dating during the 'holiday romance' and Sahara has not yet spoken publicly about the incident.
Rising star: Sahara is a model and bikini designer
